text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews How about in your daily presser about COVID-19 you stayed on fucking point and did turn them into your rallies!  STFU up!!!!!  Your a sad ass man.  Address the country, give states on the crisis!!!!!  WTF is wrong with you!?!?
